channel.title: About on James Cobb Dev Site and Blog
channel.description: Recent content in About on James Cobb Dev Site and Blog

item.title: About
item.description: Hello everyone and welcome to my website and blog. I wanted to find a way to share professional topics that interest me and hopefully entertain at least one or two people out on the Internet (counting myself). I am a IT professional that builds tools and automation to better how my company supports our customers.
